title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Motif Haaram with Pearl Drops
materials: South Sea Pearls (40.10 carats). Features a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: Exquisite floral motif design with a delicate network of diamonds surrounding vibrant emeralds. The Haaram features a detachable pendant for versatile styling. Accented with lustrous South Sea pearl drops, showcasing a harmonious blend of traditional and contemporary aesthetics. Intricate filigree work enhances the richness and depth of the design.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (పెళ్లి)
and grand celebrations. Also suitable for modern formal events where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: A statement piece embodying timeless beauty and sophistication. The combination of emeralds, diamonds, and pearls exudes luxury and elegance, making it a cherished heirloom for generations. The detachable pendant offers versatility in styling, allowing it to be worn as a standalone piece. Meticulously crafted with traditional South Indian techniques and high-quality materials.
